item.description:
Chapter 279 holds a pancake breakfast the third Sunday of each month from April to October. Included is an egg, pancakes, Canadian bacon and cheese on an English muffin breakfast sandwich, coffee and orange juice. Where are you going to get all that for $6.00? Only at the 279 breakfast fly-ins!! Our breakfasts are always well attended. Fly, drive, walk or bike, you will not be disappointed. All are welcome!

 

Plan is to depart Fitchburg around 7AM. We'll be pre-flighting 6350Q out on the line before hand and can meet up at the terminal building to brief anyone beforehand.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: EAA279 Breakfast Fly-In at Cranland
